title: Mockingbird
title_text:
Aplicativo de podcast, it's may porpuse is to show that is possible to write great apps using web technologies. Fell free to use at your own will!
In case you are interest, the full source code of this app is on github, check out.

You still don't have any podcasts registered... please click on the "New Podcast" button bellow or on the floating red button with a plus inside it!
